description:
Come on a journey to increase your leadership skills. How to make the best learning environment choices with Learoy Tonight will provide you with the skills and knowledge to become a great leader, for yourself and your team.

Jon Stewart said, “The internet is just a world passing around notes in a classroom." It's fair to say that the web has shaken things up a bit and the need to adapt our ways when helping people learn has had to change along with it. There are many choices when it comes to the learning environment. Understanding these allows you to make the best choices for your team and for your organisation.

Embracing learning environment diversity means offering development opportunities in a way that better meets the needs of the individual, not just the business. This flexibility will lead to higher levels of team member engagement, innovation, improved teamwork and communication.

Prioritising your own learning will mean valuable gains within your organisation and your team, particularly when that learning is shared. The challenge is finding the learning you need, that isn't just about workshops and seminars that find you bored and disinterested.

Each lecture in this course has been carefully selected for you to explore how to implement relevant and meaningful strategies to support you as a leader now and in the future.

This course will provide you with many tips and tricks you can utilize inside and out of your workplace, it will encourage and motivate you to really understand and support your team.

Learoy Tonight is a fresh business with interesting and modern ideas towards education. Many people take part in creating these courses – from subject matter experts, to researchers and designers – to ensure you are provided with the best learning experience and the most up to date information. We are excited about education and want to give you the opportunity to be the best you can be.

This course will take you approximately 30 to 45 minutes to complete and will cover what the future of workplace learning looks like, and discuss how workplace learning has changed as well as working through the blended learning model. We will talk about the trends in leadership development, making learning a priority and how to do so as well as how beneficial a mentor and community of practice can be to your development. Our content will give you the opportunity to listen to experts and understand relevant models for you to use on your leadership journey to making the best learning environment choices. This will be an experience to enjoy with a collection of videos, interviews and engaging imagery throughout our presentations.

This course is a small section of our Leadership-off the leash journey. If you would like to really challenge yourself, join us for the entire leadership experience.

What are you waiting for? Start tonight, be on your way to becoming an amazing leader tomorrow.
title: Leadership | How to Make Best Learning Environment Choices
